languages.text: "Разумное решение. Храмы Экклезиархии лишены критически важного для станции функционала. В отличие от капелл Механикус".
"A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Разумное решение. Храмы Экклезиархии лишены критически важного для станции функционала. В отличие от капелл Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a voidstation requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a voidstation requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a voidstation requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这是个理性的决定。国教的神殿与机械修会的小教堂不一样，它们缺乏虚空舰站需要的关键功能。”
languages.original_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “这是个理性的决定。国教的神殿与机械修会的小教堂不一样，它们缺乏虚空舰站需要的关键功能。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Una decisión racional. Los templos de la Eclesiarquía carecen de la funcionalidad crítica que requieren las estaciones del vacío, al contrario que las capillas del Adeptus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «Una decisión racional. Los templos de la Eclesiarquía carecen de la funcionalidad crítica que requieren las estaciones del vacío, al contrario que las capillas del Adeptus Mechanicus».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「合理的な判断です。帝国聖教会の神殿には、ボイドステーションが必要とする重要な機能が欠けているのです。帝国技術局の礼拝堂とは違うのです」
languages.original_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「合理的な判断です。帝国聖教会の神殿には、ボイドステーションが必要とする重要な機能が欠けているのです。帝国技術局の礼拝堂とは違うのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Eine rationale Entscheidung. Tempel der Ekklesiarchie fehlt es an der kritischen Funktionalität, die eine Leerenstation braucht. Ganz im Gegensatz zu den Kapellen des Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Eine rationale Entscheidung. Tempel der Ekklesiarchie fehlt es an der kritischen Funktionalität, die eine Leerenstation braucht. Ganz im Gegensatz zu den Kapellen des Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Une décision des plus rationnelles. Les temples de l'Ecclésiarchie ne proposent pas tous les services essentiels au bon fonctionnement d'une station. Contrairement aux chapelles de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « Une décision des plus rationnelles. Les temples de l'Ecclésiarchie ne proposent pas tous les services essentiels au bon fonctionnement d'une station. Contrairement aux chapelles de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Rasyonel bir karar. Adeptus Mechanicus şapellerinin aksine ekleşiarşi tapınakları, bir uçsuz istasyonunun ihtiyaç duyduğu kritik fonksiyonlardan yoksundur."
languages.original_text: "A rational decision. Ecclesiarchy temples lack the critical functionality that a void station requires. Unlike the chapels of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Rasyonel bir karar. Adeptus Mechanicus şapellerinin aksine ekleşiarşi tapınakları, bir uçsuz istasyonunun ihtiyaç duyduğu kritik fonksiyonlardan yoksundur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
